text:
[Verse]
Moonlight on the sidewalk
Watch our shadows dance
City never sleeps
We take our chance

[Verse 2]
Echoes of our laughter
Bouncing through the night
Every step together
Feels so right

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows
Come alive
In the glow
We thrive

[Verse 3]
Neon lights are flashing
Colors in the air
Feel the night embracing
Moments that we share

[Bridge]
Heartbeats sync like magic
In this endless groove
Every move so tragic
Dancing shadows prove

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows
Come alive
In the glow
We thrive
title: Dancing Shadows
